FuncDef: The reset isis suppress-flapping peer command configures an interface to exit IS-IS neighbor relationship flapping suppression. The reset isis suppress-flapping peer command configures an interface to exit IS-IS neighbor relationship flapping suppression.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of an IS-IS process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Instructs neighbors to exit from IS-IS neighbor relationship flapping suppression too.
-
